item.title: Maze add a quote by Voltaire
Maze add a quote by Björk
item.description: "I mean, the human race, we are a tribe, let's face it, and let's stop all this religious bullshit. I think everybody, or at least a lot of my friends, are just so exhausted with this whole self-importance of religious people. Just drop it. We're all fucking animals, so let's just make some universal tribal beat. We're pagan. Let's just march." -- Björk

item.title: Maze add a quote by George Carlin
item.description: "That's why they call it the American Dream, because you have to be asleep to believe it." -- George Carlin

item.title: Maze add a quote by C.S. Lewis
item.description: "Now the trouble about trying to make yourself stupider than you really are is that you very often succeed." -- C.S. Lewis

item.title: Maze add a quote by JK Rowling
item.description: "Words are, in my not-so-humble opinion, our most inexhaustible source of magic. Capable of both inflicting injury, and remedying it." -- JK Rowling
